title: Project-Based Learning Course for Strengthening Pre-Service Teachers' Teacher Education Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Collaborative problem-solving using digital devices and simulation-based training grounded in real classroom scenarios

learning_goals: Preservice teachers must submit two or more lesson designs developed using PBL, with each design reflecting Pedagogical Content Knowledge (PCK) and instructional process elements.
Learners conduct five or more feedback sessions via peer assessment and submit a portfolio demonstrating at least 30% improvement in instructional strategies.
Three or more mock lesson videos are produced using digital tools, achieving an evaluation score of 80+ based on communication skills and instructional management competencies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
